name: ministarter
description: Simple starter configuration for fast and static web projects

scripts.commit: git add dist && git commit -m 'Update for deploying'
scripts.push: git subtree push --prefix build origin gh-pages
scripts.git: npm run commit && npm run push
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run git

author: Lionel T <elrumordelaluz@hotmail.com> (elrumordelaluz.com)
